Reviews.Title: Happy with the purchase for the most part
Reviews.Author: chris Briggs
Reviews.Content: I looked around a lot to find the best price for a system like this. I know that just about all the systems in this price range the night vision is poor. I went in knowing I will have to get better cameras down the road. The day time video quality is great for what I payed. I have to make some more adj. to see if I can get it better quality for night vision. Very easy to use and get set up. I have not tried to get it on the internet yet. The cables are just about right for my size house. I would of given it a 5 but the night vision is just ok. I am very happy with my purchase so far. It has only been running for about 4 days now. Oh I had to call customer service and the were very helpful.
